subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Boxing
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Davis, who was mourning his mother when he earned a gold medal at the 1976 Montreal Olympics, had more than 100 victories as an amateur but never won a world title.
snippet: Davis, who was mourning his mother when he earned a gold medal at the 1976 Montreal Olympics, had more than 100 victories as an amateur but never won a world title.
